fields.summary: [ABFS] Fix logging in FSDataInputStream buffersize as that is not used and confusing the customer

comments.body: cc [~anujmodi] [~manika137]

Thanks for reporting this [~mthakur] 
We will plan for this work as soon as possible.

manika137 opened a new pull request, #7642:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7642

   ### Description of PR
   JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-19548
   Small change to fix logging in FSDataInputStream and mention the correct buffersize being used. 
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   Test suite was run, results of which are added in the comments below.

anujmodi2021 commented on PR #7642:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7642#issuecomment-2826386026

   We might need to add some tests to pass the Yetus checks. You can verify that whatever parameter we pass, the buffer size is always what is configured.
